description:
The original Starship Troopers has been one of Sony‘s biggest IPs in recent years, albeit only following its theatrical release, in which the film originally earned $121 million at the box office. In the years since, however, the film was followed by a number of sequels, an animated series, and other media including video games. [...]

The post Exclusive: ‘Starship Troopers’ Remake In The Works At Sony appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Exclusive: ‘Starship Troopers’ Remake In The Works At Sony

description:
It’s been reported that Netflix has canceled a series from their platform after releasing just one season of the series. Interestingly, the series has been compared to the much more successful Yellowstone, so it goes to show that not all such projects are destined to receive the same treatment. title: Netflix Cancels Series After Just One Season

description:
It’s sadly been confirmed that Michelle Trachtenberg, known for roles in the hit television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and 2006’s Black Christmas, has passed away at age 39. According to reports, Trachtenberg had recently underwent surgery for a liver transplant. While there isn’t much information at this time, it seems as though she experienced [...]

title: Actress Michelle Trachtenberg Dead At 39
